description: Brandon Jones is a hot, tall and toned real estate agent and he’s just arrived at his client’s home. Surprisingly, Brandon finds hairy, muscular beau, Teddy Torres, laying in the client’s bed only wearing a robe! Brandon decides he’s going to go above and beyond and provide an extra service he knows Teddy will be more than happy to receive. He starts by sitting his perky ass down in Teddy’s face before gagging on his cock and once his ass is primed enough, it’s time to close the deal!
title: Always Be Closing Part 2
